title: 来个反作弊
author: 524399hjn
txt_content:
谁有反作弊插件发我一个谢谢！
现在的孩子真是，少几个钻石会屎的！还开飞行跑图卡服务器

replies.author: kanming
replies.txt_content:
========================
防止开矿透可以使用水龙头端自带的防御QAQ也可以在MCBBS插件版搜索一堆
防止飞行变速：http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=415779&extra=page%3D1%26filter%3Dsortid%26sortid%3D7%26searchoption%5B62%5D%5Bvalue%5D%3DNever%26searchoption%5B62%5D%5Btype%5D%3D
===========================

replies.author: 烧饼大哥
replies.txt_content:
防止跑图？这里有一些
世界边界设置：http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... C%E8%BE%B9%E7%95%8C

NCP，可以使其加速作弊无效http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-331837-1-2.html

replies.author: Cynthia丶
replies.txt_content:
NCP太卡，neverlag不能防止炮图
用http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-310946-1-4.html
或MD5
